Class Student

java.lang.Object
Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUser, Serializable
public class Student extends Object implements IUser
Represents a student who can apply for internships, accept a confirmed internship, and manage applied internships. Implements IUser interface.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(String id, String name, String passwordHash, int yearOfStudy, String major, String email)
      Creates a student object.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the student, which is their matriculation number.
      name - the name of the student
      passwordHash - the hashed password of the student
      yearOfStudy - the year of study of the student
      major - the major of the student
      email - the email of the student

      public InternshipApplicationDbMgr getAppliedInternships()
      Get the student's applied internships manager.
      Returns:
      the InternshipApplicationDbMgr containing applications

    • getAcceptedInternship

      public Internship getAcceptedInternship()
      Get the internship the student has accepted, if any.
      Returns:
      the accepted Internship or null if none accepted

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword(String password)
      Set the student's password. The provided plain text password will be hashed.
      Specified by:
      setPassword in interface IUser
      Parameters:
      password - the new plain-text password

    • applyInternship

      public boolean applyInternship(Internship internship)
      Method to apply internship.
      Parameters:
      internship - is the internship object that this student is applying for.
      Returns:
      true if application is successful, otherwise false.

    • acceptInternship

      public boolean acceptInternship(Internship internship)
      Method to accept internship
      Parameters:
      internship - is the internship object to be accepted.
      Returns:
      true if internship is successfully accepted, otherwise false.

    • withdrawAcceptedInternship

      public void withdrawAcceptedInternship()
      Method to withdraw internship. Sets the acceptedInternships attribute to null.
